CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 16 Since the open circuit voltage V oc of BHJ PSCs is correlated to the difference between the LUMO energy level of the acceptor and HOMO energy level of the donor polymer , 5,17 therefore a higher V oc for PSFDTBT based polymer solar cells is anticipated due to the low - lying HOMO energy level.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BHJ PSCs |
| PSFDTBT |
| HOMO |
| LUMO |

Note: The entities are presented precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BHJ PSCs |
| PSFDTBT |

I removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "HOMO" and "LUMO" are not material names, but rather acronyms for "Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital" and "Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital", respectively.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
